author: wrowe
msg: We can't ship with this hack.  I have a richer patch that does
AllowSwitchToRoot on a provisional basis (if the admin doesn't
configure this in source and in .conf, it is not permitted).
But the right solution is neither patch, it's to spin up a
root thread that 'servers' socket requisition requests over
a unix domain socket.  No time to hack that, so for the time
being, low numbered PORT/PASV port configurations will simply
